cards.title: Well-being
cards.content: Yoga can help improve mood, reduce symptoms of depression, and increase feelings of well-being.

cards.title: Balance
cards.content: Yoga is known for its ability to soothe tension and anxiety in the mind and body.

cards.title: Health
cards.content: Yoga can help improve flexibility, strength, and cardiovascular fitness.

testimonies.testimony1: YOGA YOU has been a game-changer in my wellness journey. The instructors' expertise and personalised attention have helped me grow in my practice. I've never felt more at home in a yoga studio.
testimonies.testimony2: YOGA YOU is my urban escape. The variety of classes and the supportive community keep me coming back. This studio truly empowers both my body and mind.
